attribute.description: Access key to transfer focus to the input element.
attribute.name: accesskey

attribute.description: Activates AJAX. The default value is false (no AJAX).
attribute.name: ajax

attribute.description: Alternate textual description of the input element.
attribute.name: alt

attribute.description: An EL expression referring to a server side UIComponent instance in a backing bean.
attribute.name: binding

attribute.description: Direction indication for text that does not inherit directionality. Legal values: ltr (Default. Left-to-right text direction), rtl (Right-to-left text direction) and auto (let the browser figure out the direction of your alphabet, based on the page content).
attribute.name: dir

attribute.description: Disables the input element, default is false.
attribute.name: disabled

attribute.description: The size of the input. Possible values are xs (extra small), sm (small), md (medium) and lg (large) .
attribute.name: field-size

attribute.description: The size of the input. Possible values are xs (extra small), sm (small), md (medium) and lg (large) .
attribute.name: fieldSize

attribute.description: Unique identifier of the component in a namingContainer.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Flag indicating that, if this component is activated by the user, notifications should be delivered to interested listeners and actions immediately (that is, during Apply Request Values phase) rather than waiting until Invoke Application phase. Default is false.
attribute.name: immediate

attribute.description: Inline forms are more compact and put the label to the left hand side of the input field instead of putting it above the input field. Inline applies only to screens that are at least 768 pixels wide.
attribute.name: inline

attribute.description: The label of the field.
attribute.name: label

attribute.description: Code describing the language used in the generated markup for this component.
attribute.name: lang

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when input element loses focus.
attribute.name: onblur

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when input element loses focus and its value has been modified since gaining focus.
attribute.name: onchange

attribute.description: OnClick DHTML event .
attribute.name: onclick

attribute.description: JavaScript to be executed when ajax completes with success.
attribute.name: oncomplete

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when input element is double clicked.
attribute.name: ondblclick

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when input element receives focus.
attribute.name: onfocus

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when a key is pressed down over input element.
attribute.name: onkeydown

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when a key is pressed and released over input element.
attribute.name: onkeypress

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when a key is released over input element.
attribute.name: onkeyup

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when a pointer input element is pressed down over input element.
attribute.name: onmousedown

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when a pointer input element is moved within input element.
attribute.name: onmousemove

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when a pointer input element is moved away from input element.
attribute.name: onmouseout

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when a pointer input element is moved onto input element.
attribute.name: onmouseover

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when a pointer input element is released over input element.
attribute.name: onmouseup

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when text within input element is selected by user.
attribute.name: onselect

attribute.description: The placeholder attribute shows text in a field until the field is focused upon, then hides the text.
attribute.name: placeholder

attribute.description: Comma or space separated list of ids or search expressions denoting which values are to be sent to the server.
attribute.name: process

attribute.description: Flag indicating that this input element will prevent changes by the user.
attribute.name: readonly

attribute.description: Allows you to suppress automatic rendering of labels. Used by AngularFaces, too.
attribute.name: render-label

attribute.description: Allows you to suppress automatic rendering of labels. Used by AngularFaces, too.
attribute.name: renderLabel

attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the component, when set to false the component will not be rendered.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: Boolean value Require input in the component when the form is submitted.
attribute.name: required

attribute.description: Message to show if the user did not specify a value and the attribute required is set to true.
attribute.name: required-message

attribute.description: Message to show if the user did not specify a value and the attribute required is set to true.
attribute.name: requiredMessage

attribute.description: Number of characters used to determine the width of the input element.
attribute.name: size

attribute.description: The size of the input specified as number of grid columns.
attribute.name: span

attribute.description: Inline style of the input element.
attribute.name: style

attribute.description: Style class of the input element.
attribute.name: style-class

attribute.description: Style class of the input element.
attribute.name: styleClass

attribute.description: Position of this element in the tabbing order for the current document. This value must be an integer between 0 and 32767.
attribute.name: tabindex

attribute.description: Advisory tooltip information.
attribute.name: title

attribute.description: The text of the tooltip.
attribute.name: tooltip

attribute.description: Where is the tooltip div generated? That's primarily a technical value that can be used to fix rendering errors in special cases. Also see data-container in the documentation of Bootstrap. The default value is body.
attribute.name: tooltip-container

attribute.description: Where is the tooltip div generated? That's primarily a technical value that can be used to fix rendering errors in special cases. Also see data-container in the documentation of Bootstrap. The default value is body.
attribute.name: tooltipContainer

attribute.description: The tooltip is shown and hidden with a delay. This value is the delay in milliseconds. Defaults to 0 (no delay).
attribute.name: tooltip-delay

attribute.description: The tooltip is shown and hidden with a delay. This value is the delay in milliseconds. Defaults to 0 (no delay).
attribute.name: tooltipDelay

attribute.description: The tooltip is hidden with a delay. This value is the delay in milliseconds. Defaults to 0 (no delay).
attribute.name: tooltip-delay-hide

attribute.description: The tooltip is hidden with a delay. This value is the delay in milliseconds. Defaults to 0 (no delay).
attribute.name: tooltipDelayHide

attribute.description: The tooltip is shown with a delay. This value is the delay in milliseconds. Defaults to 0 (no delay).
attribute.name: tooltip-delay-show

attribute.description: The tooltip is shown with a delay. This value is the delay in milliseconds. Defaults to 0 (no delay).
attribute.name: tooltipDelayShow

attribute.description: Where is the tooltip to be displayed? Possible values: "top", "bottom", "right", "left", "auto", "auto top", "auto bottom", "auto right" and "auto left". Default to "bottom".
attribute.name: tooltip-position

attribute.description: Where is the tooltip to be displayed? Possible values: "top", "bottom", "right", "left", "auto", "auto top", "auto bottom", "auto right" and "auto left". Default to "bottom".
attribute.name: tooltipPosition

attribute.description: Component(s) to be updated with ajax.
attribute.name: update

attribute.description: Value.
attribute.name: value
